les_model:
*** Variable declarations
vars DeviceX : Device .
vars UserY : User .
vars StateA StateB : State .
*** State-transition rules for On/Off
eq < DeviceX |'attribute': StateA , ... >
-> < DeviceX |'attribute': StateB , ... > .
eq < DeviceX |'attribute': StateB , ... >
-> < DeviceX |'attribute': StateA , ... > .
*** Event generation rules for On/Off
eq < DeviceX |'attribute': StateA , ... >
-> 'event': StateChanged (DeviceX) .
eq < DeviceX |'attribute': StateB , ... >
-> 'event': StateChanged (DeviceX) .
raw_response:
*** Variable declarations
vars DeviceX : Device .
vars UserY : User .
vars StateA StateB : State .

*** State-transition rules for On/Off
eq < DeviceX |'attribute': StateA , ... >
   $ UserY'command'DeviceX
-> < DeviceX |'attribute': StateB , ... > .

eq < DeviceX |'attribute': StateB , ... >
   $ UserY'command'DeviceX
-> < DeviceX |'attribute': StateA , ... > .

*** Event generation rules for On/Off
eq < DeviceX |'attribute': StateA , ... >
   -> 'event': StateChanged (DeviceX) .

eq < DeviceX |'attribute': StateB , ... >
   -> 'event': StateChanged (DeviceX) .
